comment._content:
joseppc and Adolfo Arranz: Thanks a lot for finding out the identity of the town so swiftly! You've really been to a great help, and we can now complete the information in our database :-) 

And please hang on - more pics of Spanish towns to identify are to come...
/Anna B.

comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Olvera, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 60749568@N02
comment._content:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/swedish_heritage_board] 
Hello, my name is Francisco Romero and I am from Olvera. I read that Curman did pictures 90  in this trip. Can you tell if there are any pictures from Olvera? I'm very interested. Thank you

comment.author: 34419668@N08
comment._content:
Hi Francisco, so glad to hear you're interested! This is the only picture from Olvera by Carl Curman in our collections. (We've got a blue cyanotype copy from the same negative, but it has not been digitized). A lot of the 90 original copies from Spain by Carl Curman are of the same motifs, and 30 are exactly the same as others, but cyanotypes.  

We've chosen the best and most interesting of these pics to be digitized and presented here on  Flickr Commons. Hope you enjoy them!

/Anna B.
